20110128140620.000|20110128140621.000|CC1|MAIN TAKEN TO  CEDARS-SINAI     
20110128140621.000|20110128140623.000|CC1|WHERE HE MAY UNDERGO SURGERY    
20110128140623.000|20110128140623.000|CC1|THIS MORNING.
